metadata.title: Southcentral - Regional Database

creators.name: Alaska Department of Natural Resources (DNR), Geological
Geophysical Surveys Division, Resource Analysis Section

metadata.description: Data Type: Multi-Resources;   The datasets included in this database were compiled as part of the Alaska Land and Resource Mapping Program (ALARM). This program involved the systematic preparation, mapping, and automation of natural resource data in a standardized approach for data classification and resolution. ESRI of Redlands California was involved in the automation of the datasets in this database. Database compiled at 1:250,000 scale. Intended to support State of Alaska, Dept. of Natural Resources, management decision making processes.
keywords: Alaska Land and Resource Mapping Program (ALARM)
